## blade destroy

Destroy a chaos experiment

### Synopsis

Destroy a chaos experiment by experiment uid which you can run status command to query

```
blade destroy UID
```

### Examples

```
destroy 47cc0744f1bb
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for destroy
```

```
  -d, --debug   Set client to DEBUG mode
```
